title: How to Make Homemade Fudgesickles

steps.headline: Pour the package of chocolate pudding into the bowl.
Mix it until it is smooth.
Beat in ¼ cup of sugar and about 1 cup evaporated milk.
steps.description: Add more or less evaporated milk to achieve your preferred thickness and taste.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into small containers.
steps.description: Try ice cube trays, plastic popsicle molds, paper or plastic cups.

steps.headline: Cover the forms with a layer of plastic wrap or aluminum foil.
Insert the toothpicks through a small hole in the wrap or foil to make them stand up straight.
Place the forms or trays into the freezer and let them freeze for a few hours at least.

text: Pour the package of chocolate pudding into the bowl.  Add 2 cups of evaporated milk.  Stir with a wire whisk.  Mix it until it is smooth.  Beat in ¼ cup of sugar and about 1 cup evaporated milk. Add more or less evaporated milk to achieve your preferred thickness and taste. Pour the mixture into small containers. Try ice cube trays, plastic popsicle molds, paper or plastic cups. Cover the forms with a layer of plastic wrap or aluminum foil.  Insert the toothpicks through a small hole in the wrap or foil to make them stand up straight.  Place the forms or trays into the freezer and let them freeze for a few hours at least.  Enjoy!
